title: NACC Uniform Data Set (UDS) – FOLLOW-UP Visit Packet: Form A5: Subject Health History
description: NOTE: This form is to be completed by the clinician. For additional clarification and examples, see UDS Coding Guidebook for Initial Visit Packet, Form A5. Check only one box per question.

CVOTHRX.title: 1G1 Cardiovascular disease, other (specify)
CVOTHRX.description: Any text or numbers, but cannot use single quotes (‘), double quotes (“), ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%). Blank if #1G, CVOTHR = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

STROK1YR.title: 2A1 If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which stroke occurred.
STROK1YR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit.9999 = Year unknown,Blank if #2A, CBSTROKE = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

STROK2YR.title: 2A2 If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which stroke occurred.
STROK2YR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit. 9999 = Year unknown, Blank if #2A, CBSTROKE = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

STROK3YR.title: 2A3 If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which stroke occurred.
STROK3YR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit. 9999 = Year unknown.Blank if #2A, CBSTROKE = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

STROK4YR.title: 2A4 If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which stroke occurred.
STROK4YR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit.9999 = Year unknown.Blank if #2A, CBSTROKE = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

STROK5YR.title: 2A5 If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which stroke occurred.
STROK5YR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit. 9999 = Year unknown. Blank if #2A, CBSTROKE = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

STROK6YR.title: 2A6 If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which stroke occurred.
STROK6YR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit. 9999 = Year unknown. Blank if #2A, CBSTROKE = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

TIA1YR.title: 2B1 If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which transient ischemic attack occurred.
TIA1YR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit. 9999 = Year unknown. Blank if #2B, CBTIA = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

TIA2YR.title: 2B2 If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which transient ischemic attack occurred.
TIA2YR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit.9999 = Year unknown.Blank if #2B, CBTIA = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

TIA3YR.title: 2B3 If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which transient ischemic attack occurred.
TIA3YR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit.9999 = Year unknown. Blank if #2B, CBTIA = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

TIA4YR.title: 2B4 If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which transient ischemic attack occurred.
TIA4YR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit.9999 = Year unknown. Blank if #2B, CBTIA = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

TIA5YR.title: 2B5 If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which transient ischemic attack occurred.
TIA5YR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit. 9999 = Year unknown.Blank if #2B, CBTIA = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

TIA6YR.title: 2B6 If recent/active or remote/inactive, indicate year in which transient ischemic attack occurred.
TIA6YR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit. 9999 = Year unknown. Blank if #2B, CBTIA = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

CBOTHRX.title: 2C1 Cerebrovascular disease, other (specify)
CBOTHRX.description: Any text or numbers, but cannot use single quotes (‘), double quotes (“), ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%). Blank if #2C, CBOTHR = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

PDYR.title: 3A1 If Parkinson’s disease recent/active, indicate year of diagnosis.
PDYR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit. 9999 = Year unknown, Blank if #3A, PD ≠ 1 (Recent/Active).

PDOTHRYR.title: 3B1 If other Parkinson’s disorder recent/active, indicate year of diagnosis.
PDOTHRYR.description: Between year of birth and date of visit.9999 = Year unknown, Blank if #3B, PDOTHR ≠ 1 (Recent/Active).

TRAUMBRF.title: 4B1 Traumatic brain injury with brief loss of consciousness ( < 5 minutes)

TRAUMEXT.title: 4B2 Traumatic brain injury with extended loss of consciousness ( > 5 minutes)

TRAUMCHR.title: 4B3 Traumatic brain injury with chronic deficit or dysfunction

NCOTHRX.title: 4C1 Other neurologic conditions, other (specify)
NCOTHRX.description: Any text or numbers, but cannot use single quotes (‘), double quotes (“), ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%). Blank if #4C, NCOTHR = 0 (Absent) or 9 (Unknown).

DEP2YRS.title: 6A Depression, active within the past 2 years

ALCOHOL.title: 7A1 Substance abuse – alcohol. Clinically significant impairment occurring over a 12-month period manifested in one of the following: work, driving, legal or social.

TOBAC30.title: 7B1 Cigarette smoking history – Has subject smoked within last 30 days?

TOBAC100.title: 7B2 Cigarette smoking history - Has subject smoked more than 100 cigarettes in his/her life?

QUITSMOK.title: 7B5 If subject quit smoking, specify age when last smoked (i.e., quit)

ABUSOTHR.title: 7C1 Clinically significant impairment, due to other abused substances, occurring over a 12-month period manifested in one of the following: work, driving, legal or social.

ABUSX.title: 7C2 If other abused substances recent/active or remote/inactive, specify
ABUSX.description: Any text or numbers, but cannot use single quotes (‘), double quotes (“), ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%). Blank if #7C1, ABUSOTHR ≠ 1 (Recent/Active) or 2 (remote/inactive).

PSYCDISX.title: 7D1 If psychiatric disorders recent/active or remote/inactive, specify
PSYCDISX.description: Any text or numbers, but cannot use single quotes (‘), double quotes (“), ampersands (&), or percentage signs (%). Blank if #7D PSYCDIS ≠ 1 (Recent/Active) or 2 (Remote/Inactive).
